column4: is there a way to revert a users settings to the default settings for a new user? tried deleting .gnome2*, didn't do it
settings are in .gconf mostly (when it's gnome apps)
which setting are you trying to revert?
thanks, that did it. LtL, trying out different distros, but keeping the home of the user (on a separate partition). The old settings folders makes the desktop stay the same across installs.
